name: yellow-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Cures confusion.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A glass flute that snaps POKéMON out of confusion.
flavor_text.emerald: A glass flute that snaps POKéMON out of confusion.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A yellow glass flute that snaps one POKéMON out of confusion.
